data.fullContent: Keith's house was extra dirty, so he decided to hire a maid. The maid came to his house, and for $20 an hour did all the work for him. The maid washed the windows and swept the floors. After the maid had finished, Keith paid her the money, and she left to go to a different house.
data.answer: 基思的房子特别脏，所以他决定雇一个女仆。女佣来到他家，每小时20美元为他做所有的工作。女仆擦窗户，扫地板。女仆吃完饭后，基思付给她钱，她就离开去另一家了。
